Macromedia Opening Up Flash Source Code

24 May 1999

Following what seems to be a growing trend in the industry, Macromedia announced today that it plans to license its source code at no cost. This will open up the number of applications that will be using Flash for *sure*, IMHO. I think we'll start seeing flash players in all sorts of new Internet enabled devices. Way to go Macromedia!
